item.title: GISCUS - You can now add comments to my blog
item.description: When I was researching some stuff for a blog post about Github Actions, I stumbled over the blog from Github user @nicolasiensen. When I read the post, I saw that people were able to add comments with being logged into Github. Something like this I have seen a long time ago, but this was so complicated, I just ignored it. But now as I saw in his blog , it’s super ways, thanks to Giscus

item.title: Docker cheat sheet
item.description: Stop all containers - docker stop $(docker ps -a -q) Debug into running container - docker exec -it container_name /bin/bash Debug into docker image - docker run --rm -it image_name /bin/bash Remove all docker dontainers - docker rm -f $(docker ps -a -q) remove all images you need to download everything again) - docker rmi -f $(docker images -q) delete all docker network bridges - docker network prune

item.title: Install patch for Thinkpad Trackpoint Keyboard II
item.description: New Thinkpad Trackpoint Keyboard II (i maybe should have cleaned it, before the picture…) I got my first Thinkpad Trackpoint keyboard as a farwell gift from a company I worked for (thanks <3 ). I don’t use any mouse, I just use the red “joystick” (called trackpoint) to navigate. For users which aren’t used to it, it’s a horror if they have to use my keyboard. But if you are used to it, you don’t wanna work without it anymore.
